colon.name: colon
colon.notes: Colon lumen varies significantly. Haustral folds create local constrictions.

trachea.name: trachea
trachea.notes: Trachea is relatively straight but sensitive to pressure. Cartilaginous rings provide structure.

esophagus.name: esophagus
esophagus.notes: Esophagus has peristaltic motion. Upper third is striated muscle, lower two-thirds smooth muscle.

nasal_passage.name: nasal_passage
nasal_passage.notes: Nasal passages are narrow and highly curved. Very sensitive mucosa.
